markdownRemark.html:
The thought

For many years, I thought blogging was cool, but never bothered to take it seriously. A little blog-post here and there, then wind it up and put it up in the attic.

But recently, I noticed people writing technical blogs in Medium and Dev.to. They look both professional and at the same time, so cool to read.

frontmatter.title: How this Blog came to be!
frontmatter.spoiler: I explain the process of setting this blog up. Be warned, this is a technical post.

frontmatter.title: The Well Grounded Expert of Life
